i will give him the tele x and y

this was my first proplem my next proplem is

i wana change the gharolck teleport to vegnas
like those pic

to this

i have change this in clicking most

case 51039: if(c.q10 != 15){ c.sM("You must have completed Lunar Spirit to use this spell."); } if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.vengDelay < 30000){ c.sM("You can only cast vengeance spells every 30 seconds."); return; } if(c.playerLevel[6] < 94){ c.sM("You need a magic level of 94 or better to cast this spell."); } if (!c.HasItemAmount(553, 4) || !c.HasItemAmount(560, 2) || !c.HasItemAmount(557, 10)) { c.sM("You don't have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if (c.HasItemAmount(553, 4) && c.HasItemAmount(560, 2) && c.HasItemAmount(557, 10) && c.playerLevel[6] > 93 && c.q8 == 15){ c.vengDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.addSkillXP(500, 6); c.specGFX(657); c.setAnimation(4410); c.vengon = true; c.deleteItem(553, 4); c.deleteItem(560, 2); c.deleteItem(557, 10); c.toX = c.absX; c.toY = c.absY; } break;
